caption.p: ATMP-CD133 in vitro endothelial differentiation. Representative immunofluorescence of a clustered and ( b–e) not clustered CFU-EC derived from ATMP-CD133 after 14 days in culture. Arrows indicate ATMP-CD133 committed to endothelial lineage, double-positive for Ac-LDL-Dil (red) and UEA-1 lectin (green). UEA-1 Ulex europaeus agglutinin-1, Ac-LDL-Dil acetylated low-density lipoprotein labeled with dioctadecyl-tetramethylindocarbocyanine perchlorate
